TopicTitle: Win 10 has come just a quick question

Articles.Content:
My computer has two accounts ,A local account and a guest account,i don't usually use guest account(It is for working),two times a month at most.

Yesterday I failed to open the guest account, i even tried all the possible passwords,but none of them worked,is my guest account no longer valid or does not exist?
May have been set to expire.  Guest accounts are usually for temp use and very limited.  Set up a new account.  Good on you for not just using your admin account for everything.

On 5/24/2019 at 6:20 AM, kBob said:

May have been set to expire.  Guest accounts are usually for temp use and very limited.  Set up a new account.  Good on you for not just using your admin account for everything.

Thank you very much!!!

I thought i wouldn't get any help here,is there a good way to unlock or bypass password for Windows computer? If not,i have to give it up.

17 minutes ago, 91Opper said:

I thought i wouldn't get any help here,is there a good way to unlock or bypass password for Windows computer?

You should probably take that up with Windows/Microsoft's tech support, as they would be more suited to bypassing the security on their own systems.

On 5/27/2019 at 9:59 PM, 91Opper said:

Thank you very much!!!

I thought i wouldn't get any help here,is there a good way to unlock or bypass password for Windows computer? If not,i have to give it up.

Enter into the computer with local account and open Control Panel,you are allowed to changed the password for guest account on the Control Panel,next,save the changes.

The new password you set can be used to access the guess account.

[snip]

Edited June 4, 2019 by Gargamel
Tappeas, Please Read Your PM'S
91Opper was later caught hacking into the NSA headquarters
